DOC.brief_summary: To compare proportion rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) patient prescribed opioids , benzodiazepine , antidepressant versus start follow biologics : abatacept , infliximab , etanercept , adalimumab , utilize administrative claim database .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Use Opioids , Antidepressants , Benzodiazepines Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Treated With Biologic Agents
DOC.criteria: ICD 9 diagnosis RA 714.0 Documented first biologic prescription ( `` index '' prescription ) abatacept , infliximab , etanercept , adalimumab Continuous therapy ( gap script great 150 % day supply ) minimum 6 month index Prescription claim data available 6 month 12 month index biologic prescription Continuous eligibility 6 month 12 month index biologic prescription Prescription claim another biologic observation period ( include rituximab anakinra ) Prescriptions continuous least 6 month
